name: Bali Paradise Hotel Boutique Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a curious hotel, it only has about 6 rooms but seems like it should have more. Our room was huge with a big bathroom and big balcony overlooking the pool and beautiful rice fields with the mountains to one side and the sea through a row of palms on the other. The cleaning of the room and bathroom did not quite live up to the standard of the rest of it. The breakfasts were good but the restaurant does not seem to be much used otherwise. It is a bit of a walk to the shops, restaurants etc but is nice and quiet because of that. The boatman who took us snorkelling and dolphin watching was good and we really enjoyed our trips with Gede as driver.
reviews.title: Huge room, lovely view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for two nights, this was not long enough, we wished we could stay longer. Our room was huge, it was spotlessly clean. King sized bed, a sofa, mini bar with very reasonable prices. The bathroom was amazing with a huge seperate shower room. The balcony was also huge with a table and chairs and two pool loungers. Breakfast was great, we ate around the pool but you could eat in a number of well laid out areas. We had dinner on the first night and it was exceptionally good. The glass fronted kitchen means that you can see just how spotless this small resort is. The swimming pool was also great. This small boutique resort is a little out of the way. It's down a long laneway from the main road but it's definitely walkable. We walked back after dinner on the second night without a problem, however we did have a small torch each which is really necessary as towards the end the laneway runs out of houses and has little lighting. All in all a wonderful experience and we definitely want to go back.
reviews.title: Absoloutely Fantastic

reviews.text: We came from Nusa Dua to stay in this hotel for 2 nights; what a bad experience. Rooms were huge, but poor. Airconditioning was not working properly, towels were dirty and smelly. They even had big holes in them. We asked for others but they did not have. Very expensive: we paid more for a room than in a 5 star hotel in anaother place and that for Lovina. We for sure wiill not stay here again.Service was poor as well.
reviews.title: Bad experience

reviews.text: Great place, great big rooms, clean and quiet, human size (6 or 7 rooms), great swimming pool with shade.
reviews.title: One of the best hotels we staid in Bali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast are good. Lunch menu is OK but a bit expensive if we compare to other places we stayed. Staff is friendly.
reviews.title: Exceeded expectations

reviews.text: Booked for 6 days a famuily emergency required me to leave after three. an unrelenting manager insisted on paymnet at 100% for the non stay days - a most unfair policy.. Two other hotels in Bali were camcelled with grace ad sympathy by those managers.
reviews.title: punitive cancellation policies so beware

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unfair practices in dealing with taxis and other service providers were also noted.
reviews.title: Perfect getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Far from the action but wth views to the sea over paddi the huge rooms are great for honeymooners who want to lie abed. Food is well presemted and cooked
reviews.title: Pure luxury in a quite and beautiful environment.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tourism services are inadequate. In onc case scuba providers sent were a micro outfit and mot well organised and so potential unsafe and at risk (write is a scuba instructor) There is no shuttle to town and no world cup channel on TV.
reviews.title: Oasis in Lovina

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Unless you want intimate privacy go elsewhere. IN my stay there was only one other couple at the hotel Brrr!
reviews.title: Great Price and Location shame about the prices in the resort itself

reviews.text: I found this hotel through the internet and really it was a nice hotel.
reviews.title: Nice, Clean and Good price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my friend stayed at this hotel to celebrate my birthday at the Lovina as I been to Lovina many time and really I love it !
reviews.title: Best hotel in Bali

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bali Paradise hotel is a nice hotel, quiet, very friendly and helpful staff, the hotel a has nice pool just in front of the restaurant. I saw there a pool bar but for some reason I never see that bar open during our 2 nites stay there anyway it wasnt an issue as we can order the cocktails from the bar inside the restaurant and it was nice and cheap !
reviews.title: A Good and Interesting place to stay

reviews.text: We didnt try the hotel restaurant as we always busy traveling around the Lovina and ate at the difference restaurants every time so I dont have anything to tell about the food quality at this hotel restaurant but the breakfast we had was good.
reviews.title: Fantastic location between the ricepaddies, quiet!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Deluxe room with the ocean view and was surprising as the room was very big !! in side there were 2 king size beds and sofa set, the room also has big balcony with couple sun lounges. Bathroom also very big separated bath tube and standing shower really really nice and the towels and amenities also good.
reviews.title: Very Good Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights in the presidential suite. Rooms was huge and well appointed. Bathroom is bigger than most hotel rooms in Europe! Views over pool, rice fields to the sea were great. Food was good but not special. 15-20 minute walk to centre of Lovina. Staff were very well trained and attentive.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel but a bit out of the way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have read what the owners of the hotel had to say about the other recent complaints, so let's see what they make of this........
reviews.title: Hmmm. This is Bali 30 years ago.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked the hotel via their internet booking site. That went smoothly. But the day before I got there, they sent me an e-mail saying they don't accept credit card payments for staying there. Still no bells were ringing at this stage.....
reviews.title: Calm and cosy

reviews.text: Got there after a long drive and found no hot water. Staff grunted some excuse, but a cold shower wasn't going to kill me. The next day, still no hot water (it is / was the rainy season, so it is a bit chilly having cold water showers at night after motor biking around). When I quizzed the staff properly, it turns out the hotel has no hot water in the rainy season because they only have solar heated water, and if the sun doesn't shine, there is no hot water. I said "Well turn the booster on!!". And guess what?? They don't have one.
reviews.title: Highly recommended
Without Regret
reviews.text: So for 4 days, it was cold showers, day and night.

description: Leave your day to day stress behind and be pampered by our staff at the Bali Paradise Hotel Boutique Resort & Spa, Beauty and Massage. Arrive at your beautifully appointed and spacious room overlooking mountain and ocean views. Large pool with Pool Bar, 3 restaurant areas, poolside and ocean view seating, 2 Bars (Lobby and Pool bar), trad. MASSAGE, Library, regulation Pool Table, Ping Pong Table, Entertainment, SAT-TV (Indovision or YES-TV, individual to choose by yourself in any room - 99, or 35 intern. digital channels like CNN, BBC, ESPN, Starsport, CineMax, Starmovie, Eurosport etc.), any room with in-room safe, Complimentay AQUA Water bottles (daily), Complimentary Tea and Coffee Facilities, Phone and Mini-Bar, Daily Tours, Golf, Watersports and much more. Situated in the middle of a rice field with nearly no neighbors, it is quiet and relaxing. From your balcony you can watch the day to day life of Balinese rice farmers. This is the real Bali a lot of people never get to see. Our spacious bedroom balconies are situated in such a way that you get rice field, mountain and ocean views from each one. This view is both breathtaking and unique to this hotel. FREE Wi-Fi access all over in the Hotel and in any Room !PRICE-Range: between $ 65 - $ 200 / Check out over our HOTEL-Webpage Last Minute Bookings and our HOT DEALS.
